Rooms.text: Hello traveler! Start your adventure, where would you like to start exploring?

options: Right. You see a chest shining, under the fog

Rooms.text:
The chest was poisoned and you notice how you lose consciousness little by little ... 
GAME OVER

options: Right. You see a diamond under a giant plant

A carnivorous plant kills you without mercy as soon as you step on the room.
GAME OVER

Rooms.text:
You see the shadow of a ghost warrior, who quickly throws his sword and pierces your head. You were close to escaping but ...
